name: Duststorm
description: A dust devil is sending fine debris and dirt everywhere, blotting out the sky.
effect:
- Ground-Type moves can hit Flying-Type Pokemon and Pokemon with the ability Levitate.
- Pokemon moves and abilities that interact with Sandstorm also interact with Duststorm.
- Ground-types gain +1 Special Defense.
- Abilities and moves that trigger from Sandstorm also trigger from Duststorm.
